  • Method Details

    • chat

      public static net.kyori.adventure.text.TextComponent chat​(String message, Object... args)
      Format a message to use in chat. Will use String.format(), then use deserialize it into a TextComponent
      Parameters:
      message - The message to be formatted.
      args - The args to apply in String.format()
      Returns:
      The formatted message

    • invLength

      public static int invLength​(int input)
      Gives the length of the inventory to be able to fit input items in it. Basically rounds up to the nearest multiple of nine.
      Parameters:
      input - The number to round up.
      Returns:
      The number rounded up to the nearest multiple of nine.

    • createItem

      public static ItemStack createItem​(Material material, int amount, String name, String... lore)
      Creates a new item based on the parameters provided.
      Parameters:
      material - The item to use for making the stack.
      amount - The size of the stack.
      name - The display name to use for the stack.
      lore - The lore of the stack.
      Returns:
      A new ItemStack with all the details from the parameters.
